name: Daily Tri Towers Solitaire
description:
The new Solitaire game from the makers of hit app, Daily Tri Towers Solitaire!
The super hit game Daily Tri Towers Solitaire is now available for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch!
-------------------------------------------
● Free updates with new Challenge Every Day!!!
● Collect Nice Card Back Every Month!!!
● TASTY GRAPHICS that will leave you hungry for more
● EASY AND FUN to play, but a challenge to fully master
● LEADER BOARDS for you and your friends
● FREE updates with new Question, boosts, and more!
--------------------------------------------
Please note: Your device must have an active internet connection to download additional resources.

Please note: Daily Tri Towers Solitaire is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money.

Last, but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Daily Tri Towers Solitaire!
